channel.title: Cant make server online help
channel.description:
Helo plz help me if u know how
first what i did is went to no-ip there i create a host then i download no-ip and select the host .. then i portforward whit utorent , then i put the no-ip ip in my source and client in files client.java when i upload the client files people get error connection to server wtf what did i do wrong plz help me ! :8
How i run every thing .. first i run server, then no-ip, client ,and utorrent . is there any thing that i shouldnt run?
oh and is that normal when i shut down no-ip it says on runelocus that my server is still online
